cab.content: Military Secret. 1266 ' From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 23rd January 1920. (Received 24th.) 966. No. 149. Part I. (1) Lala Pir, an influential Afghan Mullah from Khost, crossed theTochi en route to Mahsud country on 19th January with 60 Khostwals and 12 camel-loads ammunition. (2) Lashkar in Tank Zam reduced to 900 Mahsuds on 21st January, nearly allWana Waziris having returned to Wana. Part II.-(3) Nothing to report from Waziristan except slight sniping. Allparagraphs communicated to Press.Illvenirnent.
